location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Samuel Manesty, Resident, Bussorah [Basra]

mods.abstract: Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident, Bushire, informs Samuel Manesty that the packet from Europe, which was sent on board Aga Mahomed Nebie's dow [dhow], arrived at Bushire on 23 December 1801. The Resident states that he will forward the packet on board the HC Brig Ternate.
